title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2054.9 - Contracts with former officers and employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2054.9 - Contracts with former officers and employees

State Regulations

Any procurement contract with persons who were formerly
officers or employees of the corporation shall comply with these guidelines, and shall be approved by the chairman of the board of the corporation or by a
member of the board of directors designated by the chairman, based on meeting
these guidelines. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2054.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
